event.description: Dee Gordon bunt grounds out, pitcher Gio Gonzalez to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Miguel Rojas strikes out swinging.
Christian Yelich singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Jayson Werth.
Giancarlo Stanton called out on strikes.
Marcell Ozuna called out on strikes.
J. T. Realmuto lines out to right fielder Bryce Harper.
Justin Bour walks.
Adeiny Hechavarria lines out to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Tom Koehler called out on strikes.
Dee Gordon grounds out, third baseman Anthony Rendon to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Miguel Rojas singles on a fly ball to center fielder Adam Eaton.
Christian Yelich grounds out to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Giancarlo Stanton grounds out softly, shortstop Trea Turner to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Marcell Ozuna singles on a line drive to right fielder Bryce Harper.
J. T. Realmuto singles on a ground ball to shortstop Trea Turner. Marcell Ozuna to 2nd.
Justin Bour grounds into a double play, third baseman Anthony Rendon to shortstop Trea Turner to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman. J. Realmuto out at 2nd.
Adeiny Hechavarria pops out to shortstop Trea Turner.
Tom Koehler called out on strikes.
Dee Gordon singles on a line drive to left fielder Jayson Werth.
With Miguel Rojas batting, Dee Gordon steals (1) 2nd base.
Miguel Rojas called out on strikes.
Christian Yelich singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Jayson Werth.
Giancarlo Stanton singles on a sharp ground ball to left fielder Jayson Werth. Christian Yelich to 2nd.
Marcell Ozuna grounds into a double play, shortstop Trea Turner to second baseman Daniel Murphy to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman. Christian Yelich to 3rd. Giancarlo Stanton out at 2nd.
Gio Gonzalez intentionally walks J. T. Realmuto.
Justin Bour strikes out swinging.
Pitching Change: Koda Glover replaces Gio Gonzalez, batting 9th.
Adeiny Hechavarria singles on a ground ball to second baseman Daniel Murphy.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Derek Dietrich replaces Brad Ziegler.
With Derek Dietrich batting, passed ball by Matt Wieters, Adeiny Hechavarria to 2nd.
Derek Dietrich lines out to left fielder Jayson Werth.
Dee Gordon lines out to left fielder Jayson Werth.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Ichiro Suzuki replaces Miguel Rojas.
Ichiro Suzuki grounds out, second baseman Daniel Murphy to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Pitching Change: Shawn Kelley replaces Koda Glover, batting 9th, replacing Stephen Drew.
Christian Yelich walks.
Giancarlo Stanton strikes out on a foul tip.
Marcell Ozuna flies out to right fielder Bryce Harper.
With J. T. Realmuto batting, wild pitch by Shawn Kelley, Christian Yelich to 2nd.
J. T. Realmuto homers (2) on a fly ball to center field. Christian Yelich scores.
Justin Bour grounds out, shortstop Trea Turner to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman.
Pitching Change: Sammy Solis replaces Shawn Kelley, batting 9th.
Adeiny Hechavarria walks.
Derek Dietrich singles on a soft fly ball to center fielder Adam Eaton. Adeiny Hechavarria to 2nd.

Marlins challenged (play at 1st), call on the field was upheld: Dee Gordon grounds into a double play, second baseman Daniel Murphy to shortstop Trea Turner to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman. Adeiny Hechavarria to 3rd. Derek Dietrich out at 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Tyler Moore replaces Junichi Tazawa.
Pitching Change: Blake Treinen replaces Sammy Solis, batting 9th.
Tyler Moore singles on a ground ball to center fielder Adam Eaton. Adeiny Hechavarria scores.
Christian Yelich called out on strikes.
Pitching Change: Joe Blanton replaces Blake Treinen, batting 9th, replacing Adam Lind.
Giancarlo Stanton singles on a soft ground ball to third baseman Anthony Rendon.
Marcell Ozuna grounds into a double play, shortstop Trea Turner to second baseman Daniel Murphy to first baseman Ryan Zimmerman. Giancarlo Stanton out at 2nd.
J. T. Realmuto singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Adam Eaton.
Justin Bour doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Jayson Werth. T. Realmuto scores.
Adeiny Hechavarria lines out to right fielder Bryce Harper.
Trea Turner grounds out, shortstop Adeiny Hechavarria to first baseman Justin Bour.
Adam Eaton homers (1) on a fly ball to right center field.
Bryce Harper lines out to left fielder Marcell Ozuna.
Daniel Murphy strikes out swinging.
Ryan Zimmerman doubles (1) on a sharp line drive to left fielder Marcell Ozuna.
Anthony Rendon flies out to right fielder Giancarlo Stanton.
Jayson Werth grounds out, shortstop Adeiny Hechavarria to first baseman Justin Bour.
Tom Koehler intentionally walks Matt Wieters.
Gio Gonzalez grounds out, second baseman Dee Gordon to first baseman Justin Bour.
Trea Turner singles on a sharp line drive to left fielder Marcell Ozuna.
With Adam Eaton batting, Trea Turner steals (2) 2nd base.
Adam Eaton strikes out swinging.
Tom Koehler intentionally walks Bryce Harper.
Daniel Murphy singles on a soft line drive to right fielder Giancarlo Stanton. Trea Turner to 3rd. Bryce Harper to 2nd.
Ryan Zimmerman grounds into a double play, shortstop Adeiny Hechavarria to second baseman Dee Gordon to first baseman Justin Bour. Daniel Murphy out at 2nd.
Anthony Rendon walks.
Jayson Werth flies out to center fielder Christian Yelich.
Matt Wieters pops out to shortstop Adeiny Hechavarria.
Gio Gonzalez strikes out swinging.
Trea Turner strikes out swinging.
Adam Eaton grounds out, second baseman Dee Gordon to first baseman Justin Bour.
Bryce Harper lines out to center fielder Christian Yelich.
Pitching Change: Brad Ziegler replaces Tom Koehler, batting 9th.
Daniel Murphy lines out to center fielder Christian Yelich.
Ryan Zimmerman strikes out swinging.
Anthony Rendon grounds out, third baseman Miguel Rojas to first baseman Justin Bour.
Pitching Change: Kyle Barraclough replaces Brad Ziegler, batting 2nd, replacing Ichiro Suzuki.
Derek Dietrich remains in the game as the third baseman.
Jayson Werth homers (1) on a fly ball to left center field.
Matt Wieters walks.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Stephen Drew replaces Koda Glover.
Stephen Drew flies out to center fielder Christian Yelich.
Trea Turner strikes out swinging.
Adam Eaton grounds out to first baseman Justin Bour.
Pitching Change: Junichi Tazawa replaces Kyle Barraclough, batting 2nd.
Bryce Harper grounds out to first baseman Justin Bour.
Daniel Murphy flies out to right fielder Giancarlo Stanton.
Umpire reviewed (home run), call on the field was overturned: Ryan Zimmerman homers (2) on a fly ball to center field.
Anthony Rendon pops out to first baseman Justin Bour.
Pitching Change: David Phelps replaces Junichi Tazawa, batting 2nd, replacing Tyler Moore.
Jayson Werth singles on a soft ground ball to third baseman Derek Dietrich, deflected by pitcher David Phelps.
Matt Wieters grounds out, second baseman Dee Gordon to first baseman Justin Bour. Jayson Werth to 2nd.
Offensive Substitution: Pinch-hitter Adam Lind replaces Blake Treinen.
David Phelps intentionally walks Adam Lind.
Trea Turner lines into an unassisted double play, first baseman Justin Bour. Adam Lind doubled off 1st.
Pitching Change: A. J. Ramos replaces David Phelps, batting 2nd.
Adam Eaton called out on strikes.
Bryce Harper walks.
Daniel Murphy singles on a line drive to left fielder Marcell Ozuna. Bryce Harper to 2nd.
Ryan Zimmerman pops out to shortstop Adeiny Hechavarria on the infield fly rule.
Anthony Rendon pops out to second baseman Dee Gordon.
